name: @bradthomasbrown/entity
description: Minimal, unoptimized, and unaudited cryptographic entity library in JavaScript/TypeScript.
author: Brad Brown <https://t.me/bradthomasbrown>

scripts.bump-patch: npm version patch && git push && npm publish --access=public
scripts.bump-minor: npm version minor && git push && npm publish --access=public
scripts.bump-major: npm version major && git push && npm publish --access=public
